    • equals

      public static boolean equals(int[] array1, int[] array2)
      Checks if two 1D integer arrays are equal by comparing every element of both arrays correspondingly.
      Parameters:
      array1 - A 1D integer array
      array2 - A 1D integer array
      Returns:
      reValue ; a boolean value; True if arrays are equal, False if arrays are not equal

    • arrayCopy

      public static int[] arrayCopy(int[] src, int start, int end)
      Copies a portion of a given array into a new array
      Parameters:
      src - A 1D integer array
      start - starting index of where to start copying 'src'
      end - ending index of where to end copying 'src'
      Returns:
      dest ; an integer array; containing the copied portion of 'src'

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      sum ; an integer value ; the sum of all elements in the 2D array.

      Computes the hamming distance between two arrays
      Parameters:

      arr2 - A 1D integer array
      Returns:
      hammingDist ; the computed hamming distance between 'arr1' and 'arr2'

    • binarySearch

      public static int binarySearch(int[] array, int startIndex, int endIndex, int key)
      Finds the index of the key in a soorted array using recursive binary search
      Parameters:
      array - A 1D integer array
      startIndex - The starting index input in the search
      endIndex - The ending index input in the search
      key - an integer
      Returns:
      mid ; the index at which key is found in the sorted array 'array'
